structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Citation Of Secs. 295 P To 295 W; Unfair Sales Act For The Retail Sale Of Motor Fuels
law.text: Sections two hundred and ninety-five P to two hundred and ninety-five W, inclusive, shall be known and may be cited as the “Unfair Sales Act for the Retail Sale of Motor Fuels”.
